divs: Sighting DetailsI was out running an errand at the local grocery store at a mall along Champlain boulevard in Ville LaSalle in Montreal Canada. When I had finished and was leaving to get into my car I noticed the sun with the usual chemtrails blocking it and decided to take a photo of it. I did not notice the orb until I opened the photo on my desktop when I got home. The photo was crooked so I straightened it. I don't know what it is, wish I would have noticed it at the time I took the photo, but I did not want to look directly into the sun.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around October 23rd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: took a photo of the sun behind clouds, contrails, chemtrails noticed it at home
